records.message_md:
# Candidate Shortlist for Senior Electrical and Automation Engineer Position

| Candidate Name | Job Fit Score | Key Insights |
|----------------|----------------|--------------|
| ROMASHCHENKO   | 0.842          | Extensive experience in automation and control systems. Strong skill set in Siemens PCS 7 and SCADA environments. Proven project management capabilities. |
| Gbenga         | 0.800          | Strong skills in PLC programming and SCADA systems. Extensive project management experience. Educational background aligns with job requirements. |
| Lars           | 0.780          | Strong expertise in PLC programming and SCADA systems. Extensive experience in electrical supervision and commissioning. |
| ASBJØRN        | 0.780          | Strong skills in PLC programming and automation. Relevant experience in commissioning and software development. |
| Peter Thestrup | 0.766          | Extensive experience in project management and industrial automation. Strong knowledge of SCADA systems. |

## Summary of Findings
The candidate pool for the Senior Electrical and Automation Engineer position includes several strong contenders, with ROMASHCHENKO leading due to his extensive experience in automation systems and project management. Gbenga and Lars also show significant potential, particularly in PLC programming and SCADA environments. ASBJØRN and Peter Thestrup bring valuable experience in automation and project management, though further exploration of their specific project management experience may be necessary.

### Next Steps
- Consider scheduling interviews with ROMASHCHENKO, Gbenga, and Lars as they present the strongest fit for the role.
- Further evaluate the project management experiences of ASBJØRN and Peter Thestrup to assess their suitability for the position.

---
records.database_summary_md: The candidate pool revealed a good number of applicants with electrical engineering backgrounds, showcasing strong matches in key skills and relevant experience in automation engineering. However, some candidates may require further evaluation of their direct experience in automation to ensure alignment with the job requirements.

candidate_insights.summary_md: ROMASHCHENKO is an Electrical and Automation Engineer with over 20 years of diverse experience in process control systems, industrial automation, and instrumentation across the cement and industrial gas sectors. He demonstrates deep technical proficiency in Siemens PCS 7, CEMAT S7, FLS ECS, and SCADA systems, with hands-on expertise in both software development and hardware engineering.
fit_reasoning: Extensive experience in automation and control systems.
Strong skill set in Siemens PCS 7, SCADA environments, and PLC programming.
Proven track record of managing and delivering complex automation and control projects.
Educational background aligns with the job requirements.

matching_experience: Principal instrumentation & control field engineer at Air Products Ukraine
Engineer Instrumentation & control at Air Products Ukraine

candidate_insights.summary_md: Gbenga is an Electrical Engineer with over 17 years of experience in industrial automation, instrumentation, and electrical systems. He specializes in PLC programming (Siemens, Allen-Bradley), SCADA integration, and commissioning of process control systems across various industries.
fit_reasoning: Strong skills in PLC programming and SCADA systems.
Extensive experience in project management and execution in industrial environments.
Educational background aligns with the job requirements.

matching_experience: EC & I Automation Commissioning Engineer at Loesche

metadata.current_title: PLC Specialist for Erection and Commissioning

candidate_insights.summary_md: Lars is a PLC Specialist with over 35 years of international experience in industrial automation, electrical supervision, commissioning, and maintenance. He has extensive knowledge of Siemens platforms and has worked on various projects across multiple sectors.
fit_reasoning: Strong expertise in PLC programming and SCADA systems.
Extensive experience in electrical supervision and commissioning.
Educational background and training align with the job requirements.

matching_experience: PLC specialist for erection, commissioning and trouble shooting at Plant Supervision ApS
matching_titles: PLC Specialist for Erection and Commissioning

candidate_insights.summary_md: ASBJØRN is a PLC Programmer and Software Engineer with expertise in commissioning, programming, and automation. He has experience in offshore and wind solutions and has worked extensively with Siemens PLCs.
fit_reasoning: Strong skills in PLC programming and automation.
Relevant experience in commissioning and software development.
Educational background aligns with the job requirements.

matching_experience: Automation Engineer consultant at Confidential Company

candidate_insights.summary_md: Peter is a Technical Consultant with over two decades of experience in industrial automation, SCADA systems, and technical project management. He has a strong track record in electrical design and commissioning.
fit_reasoning: Extensive experience in project management and execution in industrial environments.
Strong knowledge of SCADA systems and electrical design.
Educational background aligns with the job requirements.

knowledge_records.insight_md: ROMASHCHENKO has a strong skill set in Siemens PCS 7 and SCADA environments, along with relevant experience in automation engineering.
Gbenga possesses relevant skills and a strong educational background, although his experience in the specific job responsibilities may require further evaluation.
Lars has relevant experience in PLC programming and SCADA environments, making him a strong candidate.
ASBJØRN has a solid background in PLC programming and relevant skills in automation engineering.
Peter has a relevant background in technical consulting with experience in automation systems.
